verses.name: Acts 7:23
verses.text: And when he was full forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel.

verses.name: Acts 7:24
verses.text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong, he defended him, and avenged him that was oppressed, and smote the Egyptian:

verses.name: Acts 7:25
verses.text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them: but they understood not.

verses.name: Acts 7:26
verses.text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove, and would have set them at one again, saying, Sirs, ye are brethren; why do ye wrong one to another?
